faq.title: Questions About Capsule?
faq.description: Learn how Capsule consolidates your operations, connects your teams, and eliminates the complexity of managing multiple systems. From implementation to scaling, we have the answers.

items.question: What is Capsule?
items.answer: Capsule is a unified operations platform that connects events, scheduling, kitchen operations, inventory, CRM, and analytics into one seamless system. Instead of juggling multiple tools, your entire team works from a single source of truth.

items.question: How does real-time synchronization work?
items.answer: Changes in one module instantly propagate across your system. Update an event, and inventory needs update. Adjust schedules, and staffing implications appear immediately. Every team member sees current data without manual updates or delays.

items.question: What modules are included?
items.answer: Events, Scheduling, Kitchen Operations, Inventory Management, Forecasting, CRM, Analytics & Reporting, and Battle Board/Document Management. All fully integrated and designed to work together.

items.question: Is Capsule secure for enterprise use?
items.answer: Yes. Capsule is built on enterprise-grade infrastructure with multi-tenant isolation, end-to-end encryption, role-based access control, audit trails, and compliance certifications. Designed for organizations of any size.

items.question: How long does implementation take?
items.answer: Basic setup typically takes 1-2 weeks. Most customers are operational within a month. We provide data migration, team training, and ongoing support to ensure a smooth transition from legacy systems.
